about_the_game:
Get a taste of the high-speed, action-packed world of Skyline Savior with the free demo!

Take control of Sam’s car and experience a sample of the thrilling gameplay that awaits in the full version. Master the unique abilities, tackle tricky obstacles, and get a glimpse of the adrenaline-fueled adventure ahead.

Experience the Core Gameplay


  • Arcadey Car Movement: Jump, dash, and maneuver your way through exciting challenges with responsive controls.


  • Magnet: Use the car’s magnet to interact with magnetic objects, either attracting or repelling to clear obstacles.


  • Slow Motion: Temporarily slow down time to navigate tricky sequences and pull off precise moves.


  • Dash and Downforce: Cover distances quickly with the dash ability, or use Downforce to push the car down for better landings and new strategies.

What’s in the Demo?


  • A selection of levels designed to showcase the core mechanics.
  • A taste of the game’s exciting challenge without revealing all surprises.
  • No time limits—play as much as you want!

Think you’ve got what it takes? Try the demo now, and get ready for the full Skyline Savior experience!

name: Skyline Savior Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1300x / Intel Core i3 7100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600x / Intel Core i5 7400
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Skyline Savior Demo – Experience a taste of the action! Control Sam’s car with arcadey movement, jumping, dashing, slow motion, and downforce skills. Conquer tricky obstacles and see if you’re ready for the full challenge. Try the demo now! 🚗💨
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Ukrainian
